refnamediv.refpurpose: Shows the current value of a FLTK valuator.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FLvalue shows current the value of a valuator in a text field.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ihandle FLvalue "label", iwidth, iheight, ix, iy

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ihandle -- handle value (an integer number) that unequivocally references the corresponding valuator. It can be used for the idisp argument of a valuator.
label -- a double-quoted string containing some user-provided text, placed near the corresponding widget.
ix -- horizontal position of upper left corner of the valuator, relative to the upper left corner of corresponding window (expressed in pixels).
iy -- vertical position of upper left corner of the valuator, relative to the upper left corner of corresponding window (expressed in pixels).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: FLvalue shows the current values of a valuator in a text field. It outputs ihandle that can then be used for the idisp argument of a valuator (see the FLTK Valuators section). In this way, the values of that valuator will be dynamically be shown in a text field.

note.para: Note that FLvalue is not a valuator and its value cannot be modified.The value for an FLvalue widget should be set only by other widgets, and NOT from FLsetVal or FLsetVal_i since this can cause Csound to crash.
